heading: venus rising
subheading: pro tennis' sister act was played out at centre court thursday and in the end, venus williams walked off with a 6-2, 7-6 win over baby sister serena to advance to the women's final at wimbledon against lindsay davenport. the usually affable serena, who was favored going into the match, turned sullen and sulky afterward, implying that venus got lucky. "today she was better than me," serena said. "but i can't say overall that she's better than me."
author: wired staff
text: pro tennis' sister act was played out at centre court thursday and in the end, venus williams walked off with a 6-2, 7-6 win over baby sister serena to advance to the women's final at wimbledon against lindsay davenport. the usually affable serena, who was favored going into the match, turned sullen and sulky afterward, implying that venus got lucky. "today she was better than me," serena said. "but i can't say overall that she's better than me."
